title: ‘No Jobs Available’: The Feast or Famine Careers of America’s Port Drivers.
description: Consumer demand has cooled, leaving fewer containers to pick up on the West Coast. For Marshawn Jackson, a truck driver paid by the delivery, that means a hard scrabble to make ends meet.
dc:creator: Peter S. Goodman
media:credit: Brandon Pavan for The New York Times
media:description: Mr. Jackson with his truck in a parking lot in Ontario, Calif.
